mapper.select: SELECT L.CLASS_NO, L.MEMBER_NO, C.CLASS_NM FROM LECTURE L JOIN CLASS C ON C.CLASS_NO = L.CLASS_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' AND SUBSTR(MEMBER_NO, 1, 2) = '01'

SELECT DISTINCT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_PW, M.MEMBER_ADDR, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_GEN, M.MEMBER_DATE, M.MEMBER_GRADE, M.MEMBER_TERM, M.MEMBER_STATUS, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_PROFILE, M.MEMBER_SSN, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MEMBER_SSN, 1, 2) BETWEEN '00' AND '21' THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - TO_NUMBER('20' || SUBSTR(MEMBER_SSN, 1, 2)) - 1 ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - TO_NUMBER('19' || SUBSTR(MEMBER_SSN, 1, 2)) - 1 END AS MEMBER_AGE, D.DEPARTMENT_NO, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, L.LECTURE_POINT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LECTURE WHERE MEMBER_NO = L.MEMBER_NO) AS LECTURE_COUNT
FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON L.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE SUBSTR(M.MEMBER_NO, 1, 2) = '01' AND M.MEMBER_GRADE = L.LECTURE_GRADE AND M.MEMBER_TERM = L.LECTURE_TERM AND M.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' AND L.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M
JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO
WHERE M.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' AND SUBSTR(M.MEMBER_NO, 1, 2) = '01'
AND M.MEMBER_NO LIKE '%${query}%'
AND M.MEMBER_NM LIKE '%${query}%'
AND M.MEMBER_GRADE LIKE '%${query}%'
AND M.MEMBER_TERM LIKE '%${query}%'
AND D.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%${query}%'

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_PW, M.MEMBER_ADDR, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_GEN, M.MEMBER_DATE, M.MEMBER_GRADE, M.MEMBER_TERM, M.MEMBER_STATUS, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_PROFILE, M.MEMBER_SSN, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MEMBER_SSN, 1, 2) BETWEEN '00' AND '21' THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - TO_NUMBER('20' || SUBSTR(MEMBER_SSN, 1, 2)) - 1 ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - TO_NUMBER('19' || SUBSTR(MEMBER_SSN, 1, 2)) - 1 END AS MEMBER_AGE, D.DEPARTMENT_NO, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, L.LECTURE_POINT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LECTURE WHERE MEMBER_NO = L.MEMBER_NO) AS LECTURE_COUNT
FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO JOIN LECTURE L ON L.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE SUBSTR(M.MEMBER_NO, 1, 2) = '01' AND M.MEMBER_GRADE = L.LECTURE_GRADE AND M.MEMBER_TERM = L.LECTURE_TERM AND M.MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' AND L.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
AND M.MEMBER_NO LIKE '%${query}%'
AND M.MEMBER_NM LIKE '%${query}%'
AND M.MEMBER_GRADE LIKE '%${query}%'
AND M.MEMBER_TERM LIKE '%${query}%'
AND D.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%${query}%'
